repairedDockerfile:
FROM fvwmorg/fvwm3-build:latest
#FROM docker.pkg.github.com/fvwmorg/fvwm3/fvwm3-build:latest

ENV GOROOT="/usr/lib/go-1.14/"
ENV PATH="$GOROOT/bin:$PATH"
ENV GO111MODULE="on"

COPY . /build
WORKDIR /build

RUN ./autogen.sh && ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" --enable-mandoc --enable-golang && make -j4
